text: Matthew "Matt" Harrigan is an American television writer, producer, and voice actor who is best known for his work on shows like the Late Show with David Letterman and Celebrity Deathmatch. He is also the television host of FishCenter Live. ==Career== Harrigan has worked as a producer on several shows for Williams Street and was the founder of the short lived studio Williams Street West. He is also the Adult Swim creative director. He also wrote numerous episodes of the series, Space Ghost Coast to Coast (including the entirety of the eighth season). Harrigan's animated television series Assy McGee premiered in November 2006. In addition, he performed the voice of the regular character, Liquor, in 12 oz. Mouse, the Major Shake Replicant in two episodes of Aqua Teen Hunger Force and the voice of Linda in the Aqua Teen Hunger Force Colon Movie Film for Theaters.
